example:
Cheatsheet: |Word | German | Type | | | | |
Sentence structure: [Location] [Subject] [Verb] [Object] [Ver-past]?
Considerations: - This is a compound sentence with two parts connected by a comma - The first part is stating a location where something exists - The second part is asking about a past action
Possible next steps - Attempt an answer - Ask clues about how to connect two sentences - Ask clues about question formation - Ask clues about verb conjugation
